description:
The Compact Waxing and Tuning Vises + Tool Mount Rail make it easy to properly prep skis and snowboards for a more enjoyable ride.

  • Mounts on any tabletop with 150 mm bar clamp or T-Bolt mounting hardware (sold separately) or can be fastened to Lite Stand or Lightning Stand legs (Sold separately)
  • Extra-wide platforms fully support two of even the widest skis, or any size snowboard
  • Soft, durable Alcryn® rubber pads are molded onto a lightweight, impact-resistant Lexan® polycarbonate frame to maximize friction for unprecedented grip when tuning
  • Includes center bridge rubber pads/ kid's ski adapters
  • Side edge slots position ski or snowboard at 60°, 90° or 120° depending on user preference
  • Dual-width slots for more versatility. Ski is placed in wider, upper portion of slot for unobstructed edge access, while snowboard drops down into narrow lower portion for increased stability
  • Isotropic plate-lattice provides rock-solid stiffness with thin wall sections reducing the amount of material used
  • Tool Mount Rail includes injection-molded polycarbonate plastic safety caps fastened at each end
  • Compact Tuning & Waxing Vises compatible with Tools4Boards Lightning Stand or Lite Stand for quick length adjustment using T-Bolts with adjustable knobs (included) for quick length adjustment
name: Tools4Boards Tuning Vise Rail Ski and Snowboard
